comments: The LinkedService has expressions in server, username, and password.

alerts.details: Cannot upgrade LinkedService 'AzureSqlDatabase4' because its property 'properties.typeProperties.server' is an expression.
Cannot upgrade LinkedService 'AzureSqlDatabase4' because its property 'properties.typeProperties.userName' is an expression.
Cannot upgrade LinkedService 'AzureSqlDatabase4' because its property 'properties.typeProperties.password' is an expression.
